content.rendered:
A series of updates on what we have been up to!

We continue to negotiate the terms of bug bounty agreements with our supported projects. A special thank you to Matt Caswell of OpenSSL, Samuli Seppänen of OpenVPN, and Mounir Idrassi of VeraCrypt for our ongoing dialogue. The website will be updated soon to reflect the changes to the programs to accommodate our supported projects.

We will also be posting our goal schedule soon, which will contain our prioritized goals and the amount of money it takes to reach the various goals.

I (Derek) am also working on two videos for the Kickstarter campaign that explain what we do and where OSTIF funds are allocated.

We are also figuring out a day to do our Reddit AMA as a group! We will be available to answer questions and talk about the issues of surveillance, privacy, and security.
